name: The Blue Dahlia Vintage Inspired Hair Fascinator
description:
This stunning blue hair fascinator is sure to get some glances. The rosette is embellished with vintage inspired pearls and rhinestones. It is perfect for a photo shoot or a night out on the town. If you would like to put this on an elastic head band, please convo me and I can do that for you. If it is for a child, please specify their age and I can make an elastic head band to fit accordingly. I have three types of elastic: skinny black, skinny white and 3/8" ivory. This clip fun, glamorous and suitable for all ages.

All of my head bands and flowers are handcrafted and are one of a kind.

Please advise that there are small parts on this head band and your child should be supervised wearing it along with any other accessory containing small parts

name: Sweet Tarts Brightly Colored Hair Bow With Feather Accents
description:
This adorable four layer bow is stacked high with layers of bright colored grosgrain ribbon. It is embellished with electric blue ostrich feathers and a pink and orange stacked button. It measures 6" in length and attaches to hair via a 1.5" French clip.

Please note that the headband is not included in this listing but it can be added for $1.00 more. Please convo me if you wish to purchase the headband and I can create a custom listing for you.

of All ends are heat sealed to prevent fraying and this comes from a clean, smoke free home.

All of my bows are handcrafted and are one of a kind.

Please advise that there are small parts on this bow and your child should be supervised wearing it along with any other accessory containing small parts
